sentences.en: A distant relative is not as good as a near neighbour.
Are you a hundred per cent sure it's your neighbour?
sentences.cn: 你百分之百肯定是你的邻居吗？

sentences.en: Each house was packed close behind its neighbour.
sentences.cn: 每幢房子都紧挨着前面的房子而立。

sentences.en: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局人员正在向他们所有的朋友和邻居问话。

sentences.en: He must not measure his neighbour's corn by his own bushel.
sentences.cn: 他不应该拿自己的标准去衡量邻居.

sentences.en: His neighbour accused him of playing the musical instrument too loudly.
sentences.cn: 他的邻居指责他的乐器弹奏得太响了.

sentences.en: His new farm buildings encroached on his neighbour's land.
sentences.cn: 他的新农场建筑侵占了邻居的土地.
以色列及其阿拉伯邻国

sentences.en: My neighbour's door had been kicked in.
My neighbour's very chatty — she tells me all the news.
sentences.cn: 我的邻居非常爱说话,所有的消息都是她告诉我的.

sentences.en: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.cn: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵。

sentences.en: Our next-door neighbours (= the people who live in the house next to us ) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
sentences.cn: 我们隔壁的邻居说，我们不在时他们会照顾我们的猫。

sentences.en: She had a good gossip with a neighbour over the garden fence.
sentences.cn: 她隔着花园篱笆和邻居聊了很久.

sentences.en: The case has set neighbour against neighbour in the village.
sentences.cn: 这件事使得村里邻里间反目成仇。

sentences.en: The treaty binds them to respect their neighbour's independence.
sentences.cn: 条约规定他们必须尊重其邻国的独立。

sentences.en: The woman prodded her neighbour and whispered urgently in his ear.
sentences.cn: 那位女士捅了捅邻座，急切地在他耳边低语。

sentences.en: We hunted the neighbour's chickens out of our yard.
sentences.cn: 我们把邻居家的小鸡从我们院子里轰走了.

sentences.en: We should not begrudge our neighbour's richness.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该嫉妒邻人的富有.

words.tran_cn: 睦邻的；友好的；邻居似的
像邻居的；亲切的；睦邻的
邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带
与…为邻；位于附近（neighbor的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 邻居，邻近的人[物]，邻国，世人
trans.tran_en: someone who lives next to you or near you
